info.title: Alpaca Trading and Market Data API Flows
info.description: This file defines flows for calling the Alpaca Trading and Market Data APIs. Each flow maps directly to an OpenAPI operationId from either the trading or marketdata OpenAPI specification. In addition to simple flows, several compound flows are provided (for example, exercising an option only after verifying funds). Every flow includes detailed parameters, requestBody (if applicable), links mapping inputs to action inputs, and response examples drawn from the OpenAPI documentation.

flows.title: Get Corporate Actions
flows.description: Retrieves corporate actions data including reverse splits, forward splits, unit splits, and dividends.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of action types (e.g., reverse_split, forward_split).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of corporate actions to return.

success.description: Corporate actions data including splits and dividends.

flows.title: Get Latest Forex Rates
flows.description: Retrieves the latest forex rates from Alpaca Market Data API.

success.description: Latest forex rates by currency pair.

flows.title: Get Forex Rates
flows.description: Retrieves historical or filtered forex rates from Alpaca Market Data API.

success.description: Forex rates data over the specified date range.

flows.title: Get Company Logo
flows.description: Retrieves the company logo for a given symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol to retrieve the logo for.

success.description: Logo URL for the specified symbol.

flows.title: Get Market News
flows.description: Fetches the latest market news articles.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return.

flows.title: Get Option Bars
flows.description: Retrieves aggregated option bar data.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Underlying symbol for the option bars.

success.description: Option bar data including OHLC values.

flows.title: Get Option Market Conditions
flows.description: Retrieves metadata on option conditions by ticktype.

flows.title: Get Option Exchanges
flows.description: Retrieves metadata about available option exchanges.

flows.title: Get Latest Option Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves the latest option quotes.

flows.title: Get Option Snapshots
flows.description: Retrieves snapshot data for options.

success.description: Option snapshots with last price and volume.

flows.title: Get Option Chain
flows.description: Retrieves the option chain snapshots for a given underlying symbol.

parameters.name: underlying_symbol
parameters.description: The underlying symbol for which to retrieve the option chain.

flows.title: Get Option Trades
flows.description: Retrieves trades for options.

flows.title: Get Latest Option Trades
flows.description: Retrieves the latest trades for options.

flows.title: Get Most Active Stocks
flows.description: Retrieves the most active stocks by trading volume.

flows.title: Get Market Movers
flows.description: Retrieves market movers for a specified market type.

success.description: List of market movers with price changes.

flows.title: Get Latest Crypto Perpetual Bars
flows.description: Retrieves the latest aggregated bars for crypto perpetual futures.

parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: Location identifier for the crypto perpetual market.

success.description: Latest bar for crypto perpetual futures.

flows.title: Get Latest Crypto Perpetual Order Books
flows.description: Retrieves the latest order book for crypto perpetual futures.

parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: Location identifier for the crypto perpetual market.

success.description: Latest order book for crypto perpetual futures.

flows.title: Get Latest Crypto Perpetual Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves the latest quotes for crypto perpetual futures.

parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: Location identifier for the crypto perpetual market.

success.description: Latest quotes for crypto perpetual futures.

flows.title: Get Latest Crypto Perpetual Trades
flows.description: Retrieves the latest trades for crypto perpetual futures.

parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: Location identifier for the crypto perpetual market.

success.description: Latest trades for crypto perpetual futures.

flows.title: Get Cryptocurrency Bars
flows.description: Retrieves historical bars for cryptocurrencies.

flows.title: Get Latest Cryptocurrency Bars
flows.description: Retrieves the latest bar for cryptocurrencies.

flows.title: Get Latest Cryptocurrency Order Books
flows.description: Retrieves the latest order book for a cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Latest Cryptocurrency Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves the latest quotes for a cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Latest Cryptocurrency Trades
flows.description: Retrieves the latest trades for a cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Cryptocurrency Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves quotes for a specified cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Cryptocurrency Snapshots
flows.description: Retrieves snapshot data for a cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Cryptocurrency Trades
flows.description: Retrieves trades for a specified cryptocurrency.

flows.title: Get Stock Auctions
flows.description: Retrieves auction information for stocks.

flows.title: Get Stock Bars
flows.description: Retrieves historical stock price bars.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Bars
flows.description: Retrieves the latest bar data for stocks.

flows.title: Get Stock Market Conditions
flows.description: Retrieves metadata on stock market conditions for a specific tick type.

flows.title: Get Stock Exchanges Metadata
flows.description: Retrieves metadata for stock exchanges.

flows.title: Get Stock Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves current quotes for stocks.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Quotes
flows.description: Retrieves the latest quotes for stocks.

flows.title: Get Stock Snapshots
flows.description: Retrieves snapshot data for stocks.

flows.title: Get Stock Trades
flows.description: Retrieves trades data for stocks.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Trades
flows.description: Retrieves the latest trades for stocks.

flows.title: Get Stock Auction for a Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves auction data for a specific stock symbol.

success.description: Stock auction data for the symbol.

flows.title: Get Stock Bars for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves historical bar data for a single stock symbol.

success.description: Historical bar data for the specified stock.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Bar for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves the latest bar data for a single stock symbol.

success.description: Latest bar data for the specified stock.

flows.title: Get Stock Quote for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves current quote for a single stock symbol.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Quote for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves the latest quote for a single stock symbol.

flows.title: Get Stock Snapshot for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves snapshot data for a single stock symbol.

flows.title: Get Stock Trades for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves trade data for a single stock symbol.

success.description: Trade data for the specified stock.

flows.title: Get Latest Stock Trade for a Single Symbol
flows.description: Retrieves the latest trade for a single stock symbol.

success.description: Latest trade data for the specified stock.

flows.title: Get Trading Account Info
flows.description: Retrieves the current trading account details including funds and portfolio info.

success.description: Trading account details including balance and status.

flows.title: Create Trading Order
flows.description: Submits a new trading order with specified parameters.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: Type of order (e.g., market, limit, stop).

flows.title: Get All Trading Orders
flows.description: Retrieves all trading orders with optional filtering.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Pagination token for next set of orders.

success.description: List of trading orders with pagination.

flows.title: Delete All Orders
flows.description: Deletes all trading orders.

flows.title: Get Order by Order ID
flows.description: Retrieves details of a specific order by its ID.

success.description: Order details for the specified order ID.

flows.title: Update Order by Order ID
flows.description: Updates details of an order by its ID.

flows.title: Delete Order by Order ID
flows.description: Deletes a specific order by its ID.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the order to delete.

flows.title: Get All Open Positions
flows.description: Retrieves all open trading positions.

flows.title: Delete All Open Positions
flows.description: Closes all open positions.

flows.title: Get Open Position for a Symbol or Asset
flows.description: Retrieves the open position for a specified symbol or asset ID.

parameters.name: symbol_or_asset_id
parameters.description: Symbol or asset ID for the open position.

success.description: Open position details for the specified symbol or asset.

flows.title: Delete Open Position for a Symbol or Asset
flows.description: Closes the open position for a specified symbol or asset.

parameters.name: symbol_or_asset_id
parameters.description: Symbol or asset ID for the position to close.

flows.title: Exercise Option Contract
flows.description: Exercises an option contract for a specified symbol or contract ID.

parameters.name: symbol_or_contract_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the option contract to exercise.

success.description: Result of the option exercise operation.

flows.title: Get Portfolio History
flows.description: Retrieves the historical portfolio performance of the trading account.

flows.title: Get Watchlists
flows.description: Retrieves all available watchlists.

flows.title: Create Watchlist
flows.description: Creates a new watchlist with provided details.

flows.title: Get Watchlist by ID
flows.description: Retrieves a watchlist by its unique ID.

flows.title: Update Watchlist by ID
flows.description: Updates an existing watchlist by its ID.

flows.title: Add Asset to Watchlist
flows.description: Adds an asset to an existing watchlist by ID.

parameters.name: watchlist_id
parameters.description: Watchlist ID to add asset to.

success.description: Updated watchlist with the new asset.

flows.title: Delete Watchlist by ID
flows.description: Deletes a watchlist by its unique ID.

parameters.name: watchlist_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the watchlist to delete.

flows.title: Get Watchlist by Name
flows.description: Retrieves a watchlist by its name.

flows.title: Update Watchlist by Name
flows.description: Updates a watchlist identified by its name.

flows.title: Add Asset to Watchlist by Name
flows.description: Adds an asset to a watchlist identified by its name.

success.description: Updated watchlist after adding the asset.

flows.title: Delete Watchlist by Name
flows.description: Deletes a watchlist identified by its name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the watchlist to delete.

flows.title: Get Account Configuration
flows.description: Retrieves account configuration settings.

flows.title: Update Account Configuration
flows.description: Updates account configuration settings.

flows.title: Get Account Activities
flows.description: Retrieves recent account activities.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of activities to return.

flows.title: Get Account Activities by Type
flows.description: Retrieves account activities filtered by activity type.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of activity to filter by.

flows.title: Get Trading Calendar
flows.description: Retrieves the trading calendar.

flows.title: Get Market Clock
flows.description: Retrieves the current market clock status.

flows.title: Get Assets
flows.description: Retrieves a list of available trading assets.

flows.title: Get Asset by ID
flows.description: Retrieves details of a trading asset by symbol or asset ID.

flows.title: Get Options Contracts
flows.description: Retrieves available options contracts.

flows.title: Get Option Contract by ID
flows.description: Retrieves details of an options contract by its symbol or ID.

flows.title: Get Corporate Action Announcement by ID
flows.description: Retrieves a corporate action announcement by its ID.

flows.title: Get Corporate Action Announcements
flows.description: Retrieves all corporate action announcements.

flows.title: List Crypto Funding Wallets
flows.description: Retrieves a list of crypto funding wallets.

flows.title: List Crypto Funding Transfers
flows.description: Retrieves a list of crypto funding transfers.

flows.title: Create Crypto Transfer
flows.description: Creates a crypto transfer for the trading account.

flows.title: Get Crypto Transfer by ID
flows.description: Retrieves details of a specific crypto transfer by its ID.

parameters.name: transfer_id

flows.title: List Whitelisted Addresses

flows.title: Get Crypto Transfer Fee Estimate
